tools

Class ReportGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.ReportGenerator

  • public class ReportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    ReportGenerator class is responsible for providing complete tree information regarding to directories and its file contents.
    Author:
    vliopard

      • size

        public static int size()
        This method returns the total number of files inside a directory tree, including its sub directories.
        Returns:

      • getTree

        public static javax.swing.JTree getTree(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        This method returns a complete file tree, obtained from a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - A String containing a directory path to be mapped in terms of a tree.
        Returns:
        Returns a JTree that contains a complete directory branch representation.

      • getRootNode

        public static javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode getRootNode(java.lang.String directoryPath)
        This method returns the root node of a complete file tree, obtained from a given directory.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - A String containing a directory path to be mapped in terms of a node tree.
        Returns:
        Returns a DefaultMutableTreeNode which is the root node of a complete directory branch tree.

      • convertToNodes

        private static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> convertToNodes(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> fileNameArray)
        This method converts an ArrayList of String into a TreeMap of nodes.
        Parameters:
        fileNameArray - An ArrayList of String containing a list of all files inside a directory and its sub directories.
        Returns:
        Returns a TreeMap of nodes containing files organized by their original parents.

      • generateFileList

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateFileList(java.io.File[] fileArray,
                                                     java.lang.String fileExtension)
        This method generates a file list containing all files inside a directory and its sub directories.
        Parameters:
        fileArray - A File[] array with the root directory listing.
        fileExtension - A String containing the extension to filter files from a same type.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of Strings containing all files from the root directory and its sub directories.

        This method displays an error message through the embedded log system.
